scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others -n "sass,post,wbpck,copy" -c "green.inverse,cyan.inverse,blue.inverse" "sass --watch source/_sass:source/css" "postcss source/css/*.css -u autoprefixer --replace --map --watch" "webpack --watch" "watch \"copyfiles -u 1 -e './source/_*/*.*' './source/**/*.*' dist\" source"; exit 0
